title: NBA week 19 summary, week 20 predictions
content:
Sadly lackluster week: 28 for 54, or 51.9% accuracy. The new predictions are now posted, which will hopefully bring us better luck. Details by point-spread for previous week below.

Point spread # games Accuracy
< 6 12 33%
5-10 11 27%
11-15 14 64%
>15 17 71%
